website_summaries.verdict: Best for DIYers and outdoor enthusiasts, Seek Thermal is a steep investment that pays off with its versatility.
pros: Seek Thermal's tiny infrared camera is easy to carry around and quickly detects the temperatures of anything around you
cons: At $250, the camera attachment is expensive
The images can be grainy, especially if you move the camera too quickly while shooting

customer_reviews.title: Software is malware
customer_reviews.text: So these guys keep playing with how much they can invade your privacy and sell your personal info. App originally required you to register an account, but they backed off after a lot of complaints. At this point I thought I'd give them a try. The app then requested permissions it doesn't need, (most notably your location), but you could just deny the permission and the app would still run. Then they updated the app. Now it won't run unless you grant permission, and it automatically opts you into sharing all of your usage data. So they are basically holding your device hostage until you give them permission to track your location. This should be illegal.
customer_reviews.author: Ellellelle

customer_reviews.title: Description and ratings are for the Pro, not this version.
customer_reviews.text: All of the imagery for this item seems to come from the compactPro. A much more expensive version than the compact and compactXR. I was very disappointed to find the resolution on the compact was extremely grainy. I suspect that several reviews for this product include the compactPro as well considering the high res. Don't be fooled. You are buying the cheapest thermal camera on the market and getting the cheapest thermal camera on the market. I wouldn't have rated it so low but the product description and the way someone got away with listing reviews for a different product is super shady. The camera is zoomed in more than the phone camera too. So you can't compare.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Gustafson

customer_reviews.title: iOS update will lock you out unless you register
customer_reviews.text: With the recent iOS update, you will be unable to use the device unless you register and create an account on the the iSeek website. The terms of use, which you must agree to, is a laundry list of of marketing communications and how they will use your information and images captured with the device. This simply isn't right, period. This was not a requirement when I purchased the device and was not a requirement until a recent iOS app update. Not cool.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No Android 10, app permissions make it spyware, do not purchase...
customer_reviews.text: Just tried to demonstrate my Seek Thermal Camera, and it would not function. After research, Seek Thermal did not update to Android 10, now it REQUIRES full access to GPS and Microphone, before the app will work. I am posting where I can for people to not buy Seek Thermal devices, or use their devices until this is repaired, the app is now spyware. I am also asking Google to please consider this a violation of terms, and the app and related links should be removed from the Play Store. Update your app and I will change my reviews accordingly. John Story
customer_reviews.author: John Story

customer_reviews.title: Thermal but support software is junk
customer_reviews.text: The camera is ok. You get very low res images. The Android software is junk, even the video capture does not work. Seek also had no SDK for Windows, Mac, Linux ect. This was promised back in 2013, still nada. Just spend a little more and get the better brand.
customer_reviews.author: MR BUMP

customer_reviews.title: Stop Stealing Customer Data!
customer_reviews.text: The app REQUIRES you to give location and microphone permissions in order to start the app, but the app needs neither permission to function. I paid for the camera, why do you need to also make money off stealing my data?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They want access to all your information, and then ...
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't work. Have to register product. It still doesn't work , have to log on, it refuses to take your log in.....not worth the price. If you were hunting, or had an intruder....even if the thing did work, it would take so long to engage that the thing you wanted to detect would be long gone.
customer_reviews.author: James Barnes

customer_reviews.title: Good camera, app is spyware
customer_reviews.text: The camera gets 4 stars. The image has good resolution and the sensitivity is outstanding. You can literally touch a wall for a fraction of a second and you will see the thermal impression. Only small annoyance is that the camera cannot be used with a phone case, the connector is too short. Would have been great to have a small extension from the factory. Now the app gets ZERO stars from me (hence 2 stars overall). It will not work without granting location and microphone access, although it is fine with turning off the location altogether. There is no legitimate reason for a thermal camera to mandate those permissions - PERIOD.
customer_reviews.author: DJC

customer_reviews.title: Great camera if it wasnt for permissions
customer_reviews.text: Great camera, but the apps unneeded tracking permissions are disturbing. Returned it the day after I got it.
customer_reviews.author: brian

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: We are building new house and this tool already helped to spot few places our contractors did a sloppy job. Edit: upgraded to OnePlus 6T and now unable to force Seek app to recognize camera even with recommended by Seek USB C adapter. It appears it is purely software issue, probably related to Android 9. Hopefully Seek will fix their software
customer_reviews.author: SMS Neighbors LLC

customer_reviews.title: This is a very cool idea. However my daughter opened it in Christmas
customer_reviews.text: This is a very cool idea. However my daughter opened it in Christmas, three months later it just stopped working. Worked yesterday and today it says it can’t connect. We tried multiple phones. This has been a perfect decice with our dogs and horses. You can see via infrared where the aminals are inflamed and we do message and stretching. It has helped a great deal. I can’t see spending another $200 plus for a three month supply. I could call the vet for this amount. And yes, the amazon tool says it’s past the return date. Who covers a two month warranty unless they know it won’t last... sadness and very disappointed...
customer_reviews.author: tamie boydston

customer_reviews.title: App will not run without invasive permissions
customer_reviews.text: Neat gismo, but the Android app absolutely refuses to run without location and microphone permissions, two things that are not critical to operation.
customer_reviews.author: Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Spyware app
customer_reviews.text: The app to use this device refuses to run unless you grant it the ability to track location all the time, even when the app is not in use. Totally unacceptable breach of privacy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: SPYWARE.  Faulty software,  requires location and microphone use?  can't use without registering.
customer_reviews.text: the app wouldn't even start without having ALL PERMISSIONS, which include location and mic. WHY? Then, by default it uploads your usage data. By the time you disable it it's too late. You MUST register device in order to use it. I receive 'this email is already registered' for every single email I have on 3 different devices with this plug port. Tech support said the registration servers are down and the registration can be bypassed, sent a screenshot to illustrate. The current version of the app looks different and has no OPT OUT links or buttons. So basically this is a useless $160 dollar piece of plastic on your desk.
customer_reviews.author: Danil

customer_reviews.title: App is malware and stealing data
customer_reviews.text: I'm a developer by trade, and in my professional opinion the Seek platform is utter malware. Plain and simple. Records your location constantly, needs every permission possible. Returning this product until the company fixes this insanity.
customer_reviews.author: Christian Yaglenski

customer_reviews.title: Seek app required and wants permissions
customer_reviews.text: So I can't talk about the actual camera at all as I refuse to use their app. The Seek app is required to use the camera and it demands access to location and mic data to function. (I don't believe this should be needed or required) As I am unwilling to give them my data for free their app wont function so now the camera is useless. Sad that companies are going the route of commercializing their customers data for profit. While the camera and app may be awesome, I should have done more reading into what they require from their end user so I wouldn't have wasted my money on this Don't buy it
customer_reviews.author: IOAN520

customer_reviews.title: Insists on spying
customer_reviews.text: After 20-30 days the Android application stops working unless you grant it permissions to keep track of your position _all_ the time. I also see it sending location data through the Internet to show ads, so the company is simply spying on the users. Avoid this product. Get the camera from a reputable vendor, like FLIR.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Junk, lasted 1 yr and 2 mos and Amazon was of no help!!
customer_reviews.text: Won't last and customer service is useless! I will never buy another Seek product again!!! It would not connect with the phone and then fell apart in 2 pieces? Seek customer service was of no help! They kept telling me to check it with another phone? It still is in 2 pieces so that wouldn't matter. All I wanted was a suggestion to what I should look for to why it quit working. And surprisingly Amazon was of no help!
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Hardware is fine.  App that's required to use it is serious malware.
customer_reviews.text: I want to like it. I have the compact, and it does work. It's been very handy in many situations. Unfortunately, the software gets more and more and more and more intrusive every time they update it. Just read any review in the last year. If you're fine with a company stealing any and all information they can to sell to everyone that you're required to agree to in order to use it, then by all means. Buy one of these. I'm out shopping for an alternative, which is why I'm looking at them again. It's gotten to the point of serious irritation. Look elsewhere. Great hardware. Software that's worse than FaceCrack. Well, almost. Nothing else is that bad.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt connect with Samsung S8+ with samsung micro usb to usb-c adapter.
customer_reviews.text: The Seek Android app was not able to connect with the samsung s8+ and samsung usb micro to usb-c adapter.
customer_reviews.author: Benny Urbina

customer_reviews.title: Resolution on a distance
customer_reviews.text: Got this one to use for Night sailing, Night time search for our cats as well as house fixing. Works quite well on shorter distances, on a longer distance in the dark the reach and resolution makes it quite hard to read the picture. It is good to spot heat signatures from a distance but you need to be close to read what it is. Appended a video of my daughter dancing in the dark shot some 40 feet away, the irregular objects in the background are two cats and the round object is a lamp that has been turned on.
customer_reviews.author: CMH

customer_reviews.title: Mine died when warranty already expired
customer_reviews.text: I bought it in July 2017, and it worked as intended. I rarely used it, just when I needed to check something like once every 2 months. Today I tried to use it, and it does not work any more. I tried on 3 different phones of different brands, and it looks like my seek is dead. Unfortunately Warranty is only for 1 year, and I paid it with gift card so I could not use my credit card extended warranty. By the way, I contacted seek support last week, and I never received a reply, only the email that their support desk is closed from Monday to Friday.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge Valles

customer_reviews.title: Mandatory full time GPS and Microphone access
customer_reviews.text: Cannot run the app without giving access to GPS at all times. Not just when the app is running, which would be creepy enough. But to require always on GPS with no opt-out choice means that this hardware is useless. Cannot be used in a secure work environment. Charge an extra 5 dollars and don't monitor your customers GPS for a thermal camera app you slime-bags.
customer_reviews.author: Maxwell

customer_reviews.title: DOES NOT WORK WITH THE GALAXY S9
customer_reviews.text: NO! Do NOT buy this. I Have a galaxy S9 AND their recommended adapter does NOT work. I have tried to contact their support but no reply yet, that was 5 days ago. See my uploaded video.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Folgers

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I have wanted this for a long time, when it came up on a prime special I bought it. I am so disappointed. It won't work on my husbands Android at all, it only works on mine for a few seconds. The software is horrible, it will not load at all without giving access to everything on my phone. Very uncomfortable with this. I contacted the company looking for help, but got a generic email back. I only paid $169. but for something that will not work, it is too much.
customer_reviews.author: Corrine

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: This will not take a clear thermal image at any distance over three feet. If you want to shoot your hand close up, it will produce a fairly quality image. If you want to see heat loss in your house, or a leak in a chimney this product is a poor choice for that. Just get a flir.
customer_reviews.author: KP

customer_reviews.title: Must love prime return policy.
customer_reviews.text: Maybe got a defective unit. Temperature readouts would get lower the longer the unit was on to the point that my floors would read at under freezing point when the thermostat was set to 71F. App would drop connection to the camera after about 15 minutes then it had to be restarted to connect back. Sometimes I would get a horrible image noise. The Seek customer service did not offer any meaningful feedback except telling me that the image results can greatly vary and even the displayed temperatures are notional. For the price the overall experience was a let down. The resolution was ok but the readouts variation, image noise and not very stable app sucked!
customer_reviews.author: shopper

customer_reviews.title: Nonworking android app, requires data-rape registration, no way to use without it
customer_reviews.text: They did something to the Android app, and it wants me to register (which doesn't work), and they don't have any way to get past it so I have two expensive bricks. As others mentioned, it REQUIRES you to let it access location and won't work without it. Who cares if the hardware works if the app only works if you have to have your live invaded?

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this brand
customer_reviews.text: The company does NOT have a USB-C interface. I tried several adapters...from Verizon, Walmart, and Amazon, to no avail. I tried contacting the company through here and email, and they NEVER responded. I had to use my daughter's old smartphone just to have something for viewing. The picture is crappy, at best. Don't waste your time. If I had known this before I would've never bought this. Save your money.
customer_reviews.author: CapeCoral

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent images but I’m astounded how fast this this drains my iPhone battery.
customer_reviews.author: mellon

customer_reviews.title: Very nice, easy to use and sensitive. Accurate.
customer_reviews.text: Never owned one before but very accurate. We were on a jobsite during the day and scanned a power plant we were working on and passed a crowd of people. One looked like he had a flashlight on in his hand on the screen. I said what is that and we looked at him he was holding a lit cigarette smoking. It lit up plain as day in the day. He is lucky the safety officer didn't see him it's a big no,no. Anyway I figured out how to use it so it's not hard. Lol I have a Galaxy S8 I used it with and picture was clear. For the money savings it suits me fine.
customer_reviews.author: Mark A. Lingle

customer_reviews.title: App no longer works for Android
customer_reviews.text: Its been working fin on my oneplus6 phone, and I just got a Samsung. When I clicked the 'create account' button on my Samsung phone to use the camera the app would crash. To test, I deleted the app on my onplus6 (that was working) and reinstalled the app on it.. It now will not let me sign in or create and account on my oneplus6 anymore. They pushed a software update that disables old cameras now and my hardware is now a useless paperweight with no options for 3rd party software support.
customer_reviews.author: Null

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: If you're using this for wildlife at night in remote areas try something else. It wants an internet connection which isn't always available. The unit will constantly pop up messages wanting to connect to your USB connection and then looks for the internet. The connection itself isn't stable. I lost the unit one night and spent an hour searching for it, it had simply fell out of the phone! Now electric tape is in my kit. I tried to contact Seek but they wouldn't return my call. It worked fine for a year or so. Spend a little more money and get a Scout FLIR.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry D. Hestand

customer_reviews.title: obviously previously opened
customer_reviews.text: Box was obviously previously opened. Supposedly "new" yet the little circular tapes holding the box closed were cut cleanly and the lightning connector shows some sign of use. The carrying case still had the protective film on where the lens is supposed to go. Watching various unboxing videos online it does seem that I received everything I was supposed to inside the box (camera, protective case, accordion-folded pamphlet). The device itself seems to work well, no issues so far. Just a little frustrating that I received what would be considered a refurb or returned product instead of new. Item was sold by Amazon.com, not a third party.
customer_reviews.author: S. Paterson

customer_reviews.title: Wrong decripo
customer_reviews.text: Bought this Thermo camera to use with my android Samsung S9 plus and find out that my phone is not compatible with this camera as described in item description for new android phones. The information is wrong and I’m very disappointed and frustrated with seller
customer_reviews.author: Crzy blonde

customer_reviews.title: Awful experience
customer_reviews.text: Horrible experience. Device itself is pretty good. Interface is terrible. Will Not work with a USB-C adapter, tried on 3 different phones. Then tried with 2 different tablets. On one tablet, app said it was not compatible with android version 6. The other tablet, it worked, but image was upside down, with NO WAY to right the image. Apparently the device is designed to only work if the USB port is on the bottom of the device. Seriously? No way to reverse the image? Terrible..
customer_reviews.author: tom

customer_reviews.title: Poor performance compared to others.
customer_reviews.text: Having used a few FLIR devices, this product is woefully inadequate and lags. Any moving objects are not picked up in real time, or in time at all. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: OVERWATCH

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work with most Android phones
customer_reviews.text: Does not work on Samsung Galaxy s9 Does not work on lots of Android phones. Seek is being very sneaky about this. They have a list of compatible phones on their website. But none of the newer phones everyone is complain don't work....seek does not have them listed as phones that don't work. Very frustrating. If you have an Android phone this probably won't work. Unless your phone is on the list of compatible phones. So far I haven't been able to get in touch with the company. If I hear anything from them I will update this review. I have the compact pro.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Will work on Pixel 2 XL
customer_reviews.text: I'm revising my review. Getting this camera to work at first was a bit of a pain in the butt. But after communicating with their support team, we got it. YOU DO NEED A VERY PARTICULAR USB-C ADAPTER TO MAKE THIS WORK. Generic adapters cannot convey data properly and is no fault of Seek. Their website will tell you which ones these are. The problem I had was getting past registration/login to be able to use the camera. A bit frustrating when your wall is soaked and the camera wouldn't do any good. BUT, in BLUE lettering on BLUE background under the login fields is option to opt out of all of that and get straight to the camera. Huzzah.
customer_reviews.author: Blue

customer_reviews.title: MALware/SPYware/Crapware app
customer_reviews.text: App requires access to location and microphone to function. If denied, the app takes you the app permissions and will not function until those permissions are allowed. It also attempts to "phone home" when opening. Original app was not this invasive. Camera functioned reasonably well until the recent app changes. App has been uninstalled
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: These aren't the Flirs your looking for!!!
customer_reviews.text: Returned it to Seek. Very poor focus ability. App for Samsung tablet and Samsung 7 does not give you the ability to change the cameras orientation. It will not level out for a landscape view. This unit will not record video on any device as described! THEY WILL NOT RECORD PERIOD!!! The app will let you access the cameras functions but for the price the features and functions just didn't work for us. Keep looking.... these aren't the FLIR's your looking for!
customer_reviews.author: IFS World Wide Media Group Inc.

customer_reviews.title: For what I wanted it for it is excellent.  Invaluable tracking device.
customer_reviews.text: I have spent hours on hands and knees tracking deer looking for sign to follow it and retrieve. This tool is amazing. It can find the slightest changes in heat and thus makes tracking easier and faster. Allowing for 100% success rate in retrieval.
customer_reviews.author: Alan DeFelice

customer_reviews.title: App cannot find device
customer_reviews.text: You need to plug the camera into your phone before the app requires you to enter all your contact info so they can sell it before it will activate. The next thing that happens is it says it cannot find device (you know, the one plugged into the phone so the app would start) There are literally four lines of instructions which were followed to the letter. No other info is included. Buy a pet rock, its cheaper and does nothing equally well.
customer_reviews.author: James Schubert

customer_reviews.title: Great for work!
customer_reviews.text: I’m in Home Improvement as a Project Advisor for a New England company that sells windows and doors. This has been a very powerful tool to show our customers there thermal efficiency or lack thereof beyond the ability of the human eye. The filters are great as are the available settings. The app is very user friendly and allows for many actions to help my customers. Excellent product!
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Seems to connect but then immediately displays "Oops! We ...
customer_reviews.text: Seems to connect but then immediately displays "Oops! We can't find a device." I have spent 2 days trying to get this to work. Support line goes unanswered. Piece of junk!
customer_reviews.author: Denise Stone

customer_reviews.title: Imager not bad but app on the iPhone is incredibly poor, temperatures not read properly.
customer_reviews.text: The imager itself isn't bad. It's sensitive enough to read a handprint off a hand placed on bathroom tile for just a few seconds. However, the app on the iPhone is absolutely horrible. First, on iOS 11 it constantly gives you an error that you don't have enough space on your phone even though my phone has several gigs free. Fortunately, the image is actually stored in Photos properly so it's a super annoying bug but not a killer one. The main reason I'm disappointed with this is that the imager doesn't read values below 20C. See the photo of the insides of my freezer attached. It should be reading -5C (23F) but it says instead, 20C (68F).
customer_reviews.author: Reluctant Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bad
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. The image was blurry and I couldn’t understand what I wa looking at. I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Their app requires access to my location AT ALL TIMES!
customer_reviews.text: Their app doesn't just require to know your location, but it requires that you let it access your location even when you aren't using the app. And if you try to turn that off the app detects it and stops working. This is spyware.
customer_reviews.author: david

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good!!!
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good little thermal imaging camera especially attach them to an iPhone didn’t expect a whole lot but turned out better than I thought I really like it works good and it’s pretty accurate considering the price and the fact that it’s not a high-end Imgur it’s definitely worth the money and using it for paranormal investigations it really does come in handy plus I can use it around the house too for Arden and jobs that require the use of it all in all good job I definitely think about buying it again
customer_reviews.author: c.j.

customer_reviews.title: Not working in low temperature
customer_reviews.text: I bought this one as a present for my husband. He was really excited about this device but the device is not working in low temperature at all (works OK inside the house and not working outside at all - it shows absolutely random temperature)! We contacted official support to figure out if it's known the issue but didn't get any informative response. Will have to return it. Really disappointed about the product.
customer_reviews.author: Olga

customer_reviews.title: Good in its segment
customer_reviews.text: Not bad, just installed application , plugged in and begin to work. (Optional registration) My device is - Samsung A720F (android) I used it with adapter USB Type C to standard Micro USB for charging, sync or data transfer. The android application is very basic , but useful and functional Camera it self is of low resolution and then the quality of thermal picture is too blur , but understandable. Focusing camera slightly improve the thermopicture , but not too much. Temperature sensitivity is looks not bad. Also I did not found something better in this segment. Over all do its job. thanks for developer and continue to improve your products !
customer_reviews.author: Eduard

customer_reviews.title: Amazing device
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my old phone with micro USB. Now I have a USB-C phone and needed an adapter. Just make sure you get an adapter that supports OTG, otherwise it won't work. Some adapters are just made for charging, not data. It's not as high quality as a standalone device, but the price is impossible to beat. I have access to one at work that was about $2k only a couple years ago and the Seek thermal imager is nearly as high quality, but doesn't have quite the pixel resolution or thermal resolution. I'm an engineer and keep this in my backpack all the time because you never know when diagnosing circuits or machines might come in handy.
customer_reviews.author: N. Dittes

customer_reviews.title: buyer be ware
customer_reviews.text: This thermal would not work due to: There is a list of compatible phone which they never disclose that. So if you end up to change your phone this thing will be obsolete. The thermal does not work without internet connection. So if you want to take this to wild life to see nature in dark "too bad you can't". Just like I got surprized and it was big down. I would not recommend for professional use due to not being reliable item all internet connection... quite honestly I waste money with this nonsense. And If i could return this?!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Toto Moto

customer_reviews.title: Works for Samsung Note 8!
customer_reviews.text: I just got this and it works awesome. I've already found a few issues and expect to find many more. I am using the Samsung Note 8 phone. You have to use an adaptor to get it to work but no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: impressive
customer_reviews.text: this arrived fast, was easy to set up and use, provides useful information. it isn't too easy to spot studs in walls unless there is a large temperature difference between one side of the wall and the other. I like the way it can be set to show the typed out temperatures in addition to the colors associated with the temperatures.
customer_reviews.author: Swampguy

customer_reviews.title: I personally own the SEEK REVEAL all in one unit and love it, but the compact xlr's app is bad ...
customer_reviews.text: The device is ok but the app is TOTAL TRASH !!! most of the time the app refuses to see the camera. In short save your money until they get the app worked out. I personally own the SEEK REVEAL all in one unit and love it, but the compact xlr's app is bad enough that if I had purchased it first I never would have purchased any of ther products.
customer_reviews.author: William Sapp

customer_reviews.title: Not compatible with iOS 11 as of right now.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is amazing and the picture clarity is better than expected. I took off one star as the app on the phone is not currently compatible with iOS 11. however it works fine on my ios9 phone. Be advised you can no longer downgrade from iOS 11 to iOS 10. so its a waiting game til they update the app.
customer_reviews.author: David G

customer_reviews.title: Purchased Android version, received iPhone version - incorrectly labeled
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased to be a fun thing our family from 7 to 87 could enjoy together over Christmas. We ordered the Android MicroUSB version and the appropriate adaptor but received the iPhone version. The printed packaging is for the iPhone version but the sticker on the end with the barcode says "Android MicroUSB". So much for the thermal imaging fun ..... everyone is heading to the airport tomorrow and our Christmas together time is over.
customer_reviews.author: Anne G.

customer_reviews.title: Cannot use with even the thinnest phone cases without a clumsy extension.
customer_reviews.text: The USB C connector is too short to use with even the thinnest phone case. Very disappointing. FLIR does not have this issue. Carrying an extension that doesn't fit in the Seek case is a non-starter. Also, an extension makes the camera an extension of the phone that makes it precarious. The 6" extension Seek recommends to solve the issue turns a one handed device in to a two handed device. 2mm longer for the connect and the problem would have been solved. An adjustable USB port like FLIR would solve it for all cases. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Domenic

customer_reviews.title: It works quite well
customer_reviews.text: I had used fire fighting thermal imaging devices in the past, there were big and heavy. These new generation ones are much better and a ton of fun. I used the device to locate where my house installation was less effective. Found a couple of places, now fixed. Used it check my electrical panel for any signs of heating. None seen. Plus i could see where the kids had been walking in bear feet on the wood floors!
customer_reviews.author: Charles E. Shanks

customer_reviews.title: Mine broke before I got it out of the case
customer_reviews.text: The camera comes in a tight fitting foam case. The only way to get it out of the foam fitting case is by the lens hood. When I pulled on that it came loose and now wobbles. Contacted the manufacturer and they said I needed the serial number which is impossibly small to read, so, I'm stuck with a $200.00 camera that is useless as it won't focus. Also don't like that I had to take my iPhone out of its case so the Seek would fit in the lightening connector.
customer_reviews.author: raymond s swan

customer_reviews.title: Pretty cool. I could also see the small thermal ...
customer_reviews.text: This is an interesting gadget. I tried it out last week while hunting. I heard a little rustle in thick bruch behind me and shot a thermal image. clearly saw that the image was of a whitetail deer, who then snuck out behind me. Had I not had the camera. I never would have likely been alert to the deers presence. Pretty cool. I could also see the small thermal images of squirrels frisking around in the trees over 75 yards away. Again, fun little tool
customer_reviews.author: B Dubs

customer_reviews.title: Very nice image quality and pretty high res for a thermal ...
customer_reviews.text: Very nice image quality and pretty high res for a thermal camera. Device and app currently work great on iPhone 7.
customer_reviews.author: M A Zonin

customer_reviews.title: Useless
customer_reviews.text: Must be a Child's toy being passed off a a real Thermal Imaging instrument
customer_reviews.author: 00marr

customer_reviews.title: Works better than expected
customer_reviews.text: It works surprisingly well. The focus/clarity leaves a little to be desired but still extremely functional. The range for me seemed to cut out at 250-300ft. The dog took off after some deer at night and I was able to find him quite easily once in range and with a relatively unobstructed line of sight. It worked great for finding the hot/cold spots on my grill. I also love that it gets its power from your phones battery. Just plug it into the phone and it’s ready to go.
customer_reviews.author: Luke

customer_reviews.title: Spyware
customer_reviews.text: Spyware. They care more about accessing your data then providing product.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Oliver

customer_reviews.title: Not quite what I needed to locate a hot water leak in our concrete slab but works well.
customer_reviews.text: Useful for finding heat leaks in your insulation or even tracking where someone walked! The picture shows where I stood for just a few seconds! Works best if there are no other lights on the subject. It will show hot spots on your floor where the sun was shining before you closed curtains. Warning! DO NOT mistake a thermal image as being the same as an animals internal temperature! It only shows what is radiated from the animal, fur will block radiated heat while a shaved animal appears hotter because the heat is not blocked from radiating.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Olsen

customer_reviews.title: Compact and Efficient
customer_reviews.text: I chose this thermal camera because it compact and had a decent reputation for showing off temperature differences. I do like the camera. I wonder how many people are thinking they're an expert with just this one item. Be careful to make sure that you get the right one. This was the one that works best for my needs since I wanted a wider angle. This is not the one you need for wildlife but it should give you a decent understanding of where you are losing energy, whether it is heat loss in the winter or air conditioning in the summer.
customer_reviews.author: Wisconsin Guy

customer_reviews.title: App has turned in to Spyware
customer_reviews.text: Company spies on you worse than Facebook! Android app REQUIRES full time access to your location. Allowing while the app is being used does not work, the app will immediately exit. They require the ability to track your location all the time. They don't need that permission, even Facebook doesn't require that permission for their app.
customer_reviews.author: David Adams

customer_reviews.title: Bad thermal camera
customer_reviews.text: Don’t spend money in this product, I regret buying it. You can't know what you are watching, very bad quality, Very disappointed with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Eduardo

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Not that great. Seems more like a toy. I think the videos and pictures posted are not realistic. There is not a lot of detail from a far away image. We measured 100 yards exactly and the detail is gone. I might want to buy the pro version with better resolution. Works great for small stuff but spotting a deer or person at 100 yards is a stretch.
customer_reviews.author: Dg3toyota

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't get the device to operate
customer_reviews.text: Um. I couldn't get the device to operate. I never made it past the sign-up/sign-on page. I am using on a Samsung Galaxy tablet that is relatively new. The software said I signed up but the sign-on said there was an error. Why is this even necessary; I mean isn't paying for the device enough? Why is signing on a required element of this device; are there enough shady users out there who would share the device to meaningfully dent their sales goals? Sorry, return it goes....
customer_reviews.author: CHRIS HAIDINYAK

customer_reviews.title: Good for home use; takes time to learn
customer_reviews.text: With patience I've found this to be a useful tool. It's small & efficient but hard to use and slower than appears. Focussing is difficult & best done by moving away or towards what you are measuring. User interface is easy to learn but not all modes function equivalently. It's taken several uses to get the hang of what it does. Useful though.
customer_reviews.author: Dettabra

customer_reviews.title: Can't beat the price.
customer_reviews.text: Works as stated. I needed it for project and from a cost point was a good deal. The focus is hard to get right. The biggest problem I have had is with the USB plug. I had to get an adapter to hook it to my Samsung Note 8. The connections can disconnect randomly. Don't know if it is the adapter or the camera USB. It plugs in to my old android phone put because to the USB it to in facing the user. The do tell you about this so I can blame the manufacture. If you are using it to observer a static subject it works great. Moving targets at a distance can be difficult to work with.
customer_reviews.author: T. Mayer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for the DIYer who wants to see how they can improve their homes efficiency
customer_reviews.text: Bought this camera to find places in my house and my toy-hauler RV that need addressed to make them more energy efficient. In this pics you can see that my Original builder windows are terrible. The outside temp was about 106 degrees. You can even see it pick up my bodies heat signature reflection delta. These images are what sold me on ordering all new windows. Cant wait to see the difference the new ultra Low E windows with a rating of .12 and the images I get with the camera.
customer_reviews.author: Scott S.

customer_reviews.title: Does not work with usb-c
customer_reviews.text: I would have used this for my HVAC business, but this is the worst thermal imager that I have ever had. It is 2018 and usb-c is not an option. I tried 5 different brands of adaptors and this picture of my dog 3 feet from me is the best that i have been able to take. Somewhere it should state that it does not work with usb-c adapters. My Flir 1 works well with the adapters and now they offer a usb-c option. DO NOT ORDER IF YOUR PHONE IS USB-C.
customer_reviews.author: michael wells

customer_reviews.title: Their compatibility list isn't complete. Doesn't work with Moto!
customer_reviews.text: I actually don't know how well this version of the Seek works, as I never got it to work. It doesn't work the the Moto Force phones, as those phones don't supply power to the USB-C port. I wouldn't have bought it, but Seek never tested Moto phones, so I was under the impression that phone was bad, or the Seek was bad. It took an exchange and a month of searching to finally find out that the Seek could NEVER be used on my phone and I was wasting my time. I'm taking the stars because they wasted my time for nothing.
customer_reviews.author: Walter Sharrow

customer_reviews.title: It was purchased with the expectation it can't be that great but maybe it will work for my uses barely
customer_reviews.text: I had no idea this technology existed in this size and price! It was purchased with the expectation it can't be that great but maybe it will work for my uses barely. To my surprise it works as well or better than any I've seen or used before! The size of it and the functionality with the phone app are mind-blowing. Open, install app from play store,plugin and point, and it works. A very intuitive interface with a complete compliment of video tutorials in the app makes you an expert user in 5 minutes. Excellent product!
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: purchased this for that one day i would need it ...
customer_reviews.text: purchased this for that one day i would need it for a customer, then when I needed it, it turns out that seek cameras stopped working with android versions 5.1 , the current version is 6.0 ... i want a replacement that works or a refund!
customer_reviews.author: Pasieka

customer_reviews.title: craptastic autofocus
customer_reviews.text: this would work better if software did not suck balls. also if you want this to work on your amazon device you will need to be tech savie to say the least, shame on them. you will need 3 apks and a micro usb extension cord
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: Samsung owns beware
customer_reviews.text: Not compatible with most Samsung devices. Check the compatibility list on their web site before buying. The app software runs on a Samsung s10 but will not log in or detect the camera. I have to dig out my s7 to see if it still works.
customer_reviews.author: Dark Indy

customer_reviews.title: device fails after a few uses.
customer_reviews.text: Device worked 3 times then was nothing but trouble. I called support but still waiting for a return call. Device freezes up and will not refocus on new object, will not take picture, or video. Maybe warranty has expired and so device malfunctions. My initial impression was this - Device is quite small in size, yet powerful. It shows accurate temperature readings and a reasonable level of detail. Photos can display exact location and easily store in same location as all other photos on iPad and iCloud. I am using for heat loss in my older home but also explored wooded area to see what lurks in the night. So much fun!h
customer_reviews.author: kelly siering

customer_reviews.title: Great, Reliable product
customer_reviews.text: I was extremely sceptical of this product, I had seen it at a few retail locations in the past but never able to see a demo in person. I love this thermal cam it works perfectly 100% of the time image and temp readouts are amazing I have yet to find a real problem and kinda irratated I didn’t buy it sooner. Just today in early dawn I was able to spot and track 2 deer walking a wooded path over 60 yards out, once I was able to visibly see them the heat signatures were spot on in the open and behind minimal cover.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Gavette

customer_reviews.title: Will not help find a lost cat
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to help search for my missing cat. Had a neighbor call with a possible sighting, so took this to search the area. It was pretty cool technology... but it did not help us at all. It does not see through objects, so if the cat was hiding behind something (which they usually are) this was useless to me. I'm sure it would be wonderful for plenty of other applications, it just did not work for what I was hoping.
customer_reviews.author: Trebeca

customer_reviews.title: Seek Thermal XR UT-AAA IR Imaging Camera
customer_reviews.text: This little camera is great. I use it for scanning electrical/electronic and mechanical industrial equipment. A USB-C adapter was needed for my phone, a Google Pixel 3 XL. Please check Seek's website and get a compatible adapter. I missed that and the one I originally ordered (an Anker brand adapter) would not work. It also works with both of my tablets, a Samsung Galaxy Tab S 10.5, and an older Walmart RCA Pro12 tablet. The RCA requires a reversing adapter for the USB port, the Samsung did not. I am very happy with the camera. The lower cost, and wider thermal range than the FLIR unit make it hard to beat.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Gallion

customer_reviews.title: Amazing thermal imager!
customer_reviews.text: The field of view is perfect for troubleshooting! The video is a Power Over Ethernet extractor that has a load that is cycling on/off every few seconds. I'm amazed that I can observe this with a thermal camera I can actually afford! The hand print was created by placing my hand on an exterior block wall for 10 seconds.
customer_reviews.author: JLerch TampaFL

customer_reviews.title: Thermal Vision for the rest of us....
customer_reviews.text: If you really want to have good and cheap thermal vision cameras in 10 years, this device is a good start. I purchased it not for what it is, but for what it represents. It is a great little thermal camera, works well enough. Works perfectly with the case I use on my Galaxy S7, so I will keep it at least for two more phones. I was looking at the Cat S60, but I prefer modularity in all cases. If enough people show interest in this tech it will advance. As soon as one is 4x more resolution and 2x FPS for the same price, I will upgrade. That should be about a year or two.
customer_reviews.author: Timtim

customer_reviews.title: Does not work when adapted with USB-C
customer_reviews.text: Tried two different devices. Did not not work. This is a pile.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn R.

customer_reviews.title: Handy device
customer_reviews.text: I'm in the military and bought one of these a couple years ago. I take it with me everywhere...just in case. It's not MILSPEC so don't even go getting your hopes up there, but it does work decently enough. great for short range thermal imaging. It is NOT night vision, so don't confuse the two. Great for close up detection of heat/cold issues. It is very small and potentially easily lost, mis-placed, or stolen so considering it's price...keep a close eye on it.
customer_reviews.author: Robert R. Buce

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent camera, exactly what i was looking for. If your device only has a USB type C, like my HTC 10, you need an adapter, I used. Range on the normal version is pretty good, I could easily see someone about 600 feet away.
customer_reviews.author: consumeconsume

customer_reviews.title: It's alright
customer_reviews.text: I got it bc it was the cheapest so I didnt expect the best. Lots of the reviews say image is grainy, Im not sure they are using the manual focus properly. If you use the lens' focus it improves the quality a whole lot. I bought it for my android phone but havent been able to use it with that phone bc it comes with micro usb and not usb-c. My bad I guess... adapter wont work either, so im using it on an old phone. As a contractor, I already used it to show there's no leakage in a roof I installed, so the camera already saved me it's worth.
customer_reviews.author: Jose Alfredo

customer_reviews.title: App failed when I needed it the most...
customer_reviews.text: The device itself is great, however, the REQUIRED app only cares about having your location data ALL OF THE TIME. Shame on the this company for using their customers to STEAL personal information. I have uninstalled the app, destroyed the device, and tossed it in the garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Cory in AZ

customer_reviews.title: Camera Doesn't focus and dead app somewhat.
customer_reviews.text: Shipped in a very nice and sturdy box also with a carrying case you can attach to a key chain. All very nice features so far. Once you plug it in your phone it automatically opens up the App Store downloading the application it reads for the connected device. The camera would not focus. The support and tutorial pages are Dead in the app. SO no help with this camera or learning how to use this camera what so ever. This camera could be very useful but all in all. I would say go with a better quality camera.
customer_reviews.author: Munchnplay

customer_reviews.title: Has its benefits but...
customer_reviews.text: Cons: Poorly constructed, not durable. It broke in less than a month. Not a smooth picture, kinda pixelated in some modes. Pros Its lightweight, adjustable lens, the temperature feature pin points the hot and cold areas, side by side thermal and real time pic, and does not need to be charged. I say the Seek is very good for the casual or home user, but for my type of work, that uses this as a every day tool, I would not recommend the seek. I say 240 dollars is overpriced, in the 150-160 price would be worth it
customer_reviews.author: jonathan olarti

customer_reviews.title: Would not buy
customer_reviews.text: Poor image, camera develops virticle lines, goes black flickers, asked for replacement and the second one has even poorer image and still has virticle lines flickers and shuts off very poor customer service from manufacturer
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth keeler

customer_reviews.title: As good as I was hoping for
customer_reviews.text: A picture is worth a thousand words and having hard numbers to display the actual temperature is convincing for people like me who work in HVAC.
customer_reviews.author: William Hubbard

customer_reviews.title: Didn't Work, bad customer support
customer_reviews.text: Didn't work, plugged it in, booted up the app and "device not detected". My phone was compatible. Contacted Seek Thermal about it, they responded a week later by closing my ticket. Luckily was able to get refund.
customer_reviews.author: MohawkADE

customer_reviews.title: What a disappointment. :-/
customer_reviews.text: I received the CompactPro for iOS today. I read the manual, watched the videos, and registered the device. I used the app for about a minute with the camera and everything was working fine, then all the sudden it crashed/froze. I reloaded the app, removed and reinserted the camera, and now it will not detect the camera. Rebooted the iPhone: same deal. Uninstalled and re-installed the app: no luck with that either. Seems like some bugs need to be ironed out. I believe I will return the item before and give the Seek Shot a try. I can’t recommend a Seek system at the moment. I hope I have better luck with the Seek Shot.
customer_reviews.author: Pepe El Toro

customer_reviews.title: Great resolution and framerate but unusable with glossy materials
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to unlock the gloss emissivity from the app, which was artificially locked for the compact. This doesn't work at all. All it does it multiply heat by the inverse of the emissivity ratio. So if you are trying to get IR image of objects that include matte and reflective, you'll get the same exact image as matte but with temperature boosted.
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: The Seek Thermal XR works great to me. I like the different colors you can view the heat sig's in. The only problem I had was my phone wouldn't work with it so I purchased a Samsung Galaxy Tab A7 from Amazon and it worked perfectly but had to use a USB extension cable so the camera wouldn't view upside down since the usb/otg port was on top. I will have many uses for this. Seek was good to answer my questions and concerns. I would purchase this Seek Thermal camera again, great price!
customer_reviews.author: dwdog51

product_meta.title: Seek Thermal Compact – All-Purpose Thermal Imaging Camera for Android MicroUSB
product_meta.description: Size:Compact| Style:Android MicroUSBSeek Thermal Compact imager is Android specific imager that plugs directly into your smartphone. Compact’s employs wide, 36 degree field of view that is ideal for use both indoors and close-range outdoors, allowing you to detect thermal Energy up to 1000 feet away. Seek unit is perfect for contractors, professional trades, inspectors, structural auditors and DIY homeowners. The electronic unit is compatible with Android smartphones including Samsung, Motorola, ssony, HTC, Nexus, LG and others. Imaging resource comes with a pocket-sized, waterproof Carrying Case.
feature_bullets: Transform your smartphone or tablet into an all-purpose thermal camera with a 206 x 156 thermal sensor for use at home, the jobsite, and more.
Find and fix faster by seeing problems invisible to the naked eye such as: energy loss, electrical and mechanical failures, water damage, and hundreds more heat related issues.
Perfect tool for DIY homeowners, contractors, builders, and engineers.
Does not require batteries or charging. Waterproof case included. Free Seek mobile app.

SPECS: 206 x 156 Thermal Sensor, 36° Field of View, < 9 Hz Frame Rate, Focusable Lens, -40F° to 626°F Detection Range, Captures Photos & Videos, Spot Temperature, High-Low Temperature, Threshold Mode, 9 Color Palettes.

specifications.Included Components: Waterproof Case Included, 206 x 156 Thermal Sensor
specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.8 out of 5 stars2,004 ratings3.8 out of 5 stars
